item.title: Reading Material
item.description: This document contains reading material bolstering the estimation, expert elicitation, quantitative certainty, scenario, and forecasting subject matters that guide Risk Measurement. Risk Language # This section includes reading that helps navigate the problems with "risk" language, miscommunications and so forth. Defining Risk # The language of risk is used in a variety of ways and shows up with different intentions in practice. Hansson, Sven Ove, “Risk”, The Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy (Fall 2018 Edition), Edward N.
